[Groovy] Class TabularText

java.lang.Object
  edu.holycross.shot.hocuspocus.TabularText

class TabularText

A class for working with a CTS text in the CITE architecture's tabular representation.

Property Summary

java.lang.String separator

Default value separating columns of tabular data.

getUrn

CtsUrn getUrn(java.lang.String tabLine)
Extracts the CTS URN from the tabular representation of a citable node.
returns:
A CTS URN.
throws:
Exception if tabLine cannot be parsed, or if the URN data is not a valid CTS URN.
Parameters:
tabLine - The tabular data.
